src: 通用翻译API支持提供200+语种互译的在线文本翻译服务，支持多达4万多个语言方向，
his: The Universal Translation API supports online text translation services that provide translations between 200+ languages,

src: 且支持多语种自动检测。您只需调用通用翻译API，传入待翻译的内容,
his: supports more than 40,000 language directions, and supports multi-language automatic detection.
